name: Pegasus Simulator 3D
description:
Role play a Pegasus :)

NEW CRAFT MISSIONS - Collect magic gems and craft flowers and other items to help build up the magical forest!

3D REAL SIMULATOR - You need to maintain your health, hunger, and energy to survive and protect yourself in the magical forest!

EPIC BATTLES - Run after, howl, and race to catch prey such wild bears, wolves, foxes, and rabbits! Fight off your enemies who do not want you to survive in this dangerous forest!

CREATE A PEGASUS PACK - Create, unlock, and raise a pack of Pegasus to help you hunt and gather food, keep your strength up, and win battles against your enemies.

BE A REAL-LIFE PEGASUS - Gain experience points by trying to survive in this magical forest by searching for food, defeating your enemies, and attacking your prey!

GAIN A PEGASUS PERSPECTIVE - Easy controls so you can live your life as a pegasus! Zoom in and out to accomplish your pegasus missions! Collect gems to gain energy and experience points!

This game features:
NEW CRAFT MISSIONS
3D REAL SIMULATOR
EPIC BATTLES
PEGASUS PACKS
HUNTING WILD BEARS, WOLVES, FOXES, and RABBITS
COLLECTING DIFFERENT COLORED GEMS FOR ENERGY POINTS
AWESOME HIGH-DEFINITION GRAPHICS
ESCAPING FROM WILD PREDATORS OUT TO DESTROY YOU
STRUGGLING TO SURVIVE IN AN UNKNOWN FOREST
3D WORLD TO DISCOVER AND EXPLORE

Role play a REAL LIVE PEGASUS!
